# cmccloudv2_efs (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
# get efs by id
data "cmccloudv2_efs" "efs1" {  
    efs_id = "07d7eb8f-62ae-4751-968a-3955ef0a6974" 
}

# get efs by name
data "cmccloudv2_efs" "efs1" {  
    name = "efs-88vm" 
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `efs_id` (String) Id of the efs
- `endpoint` (String) Filter EFS by endpoint, match exactly
- `name` (String) Filter EFS by name, match exactly
- `subnet_id` (String) Filter EFS by subnet_id, match exactly
- `vpc_id` (String) Filter EFS by vpc_id, match exactly

### Read-Only

- `capacity` (String) Capacity of EFS
- `created_at` (String) Created at of EFS
- `description` (String) Filter EFS that has description contains this text
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `protocol_type` (String) Protocol type of EFS
- `status` (String) Status of EFS
- `type` (String) Type of EFS
